OwnerId.description: The owner account ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud VPC.

AutodefinedReverse.description: The status of whether or not the Route 53 Resolver will create autodefined rules for reverse DNS lookups. This is enabled by default.

Id.description: ID for the Route 53 Resolver configuration.

description: A complex type that contains information about a Resolver configuration for a VPC.

AutodefinedReverseFlag.description: Represents the desired status of `AutodefinedReverse` . The only supported value on creation is `DISABLE` . Deletion of this resource will return `AutodefinedReverse` to its default value of `ENABLED` .

ResourceId.description: The ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud VPC or a Route 53 Profile that you're configuring Resolver for.
